### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE player_achievements (
    player_id INT,
    achievement_id INT,
    achievement_name TEXT,
    milestone_reached BOOLEAN,
    reward_given BOOLEAN
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE player_achievements SET milestone_reached = TRUE WHERE player_id = 1 AND achievement_id = 100
